amendment.description: An amendment numbered 81 printed in Part F of House Report 118-216 to prevent the use of funds under this Act to carry out the provision that allows states to waive work requirements for able-bodied adults in areas with high unemployment or a lack of sufficient jobs.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Burlison amendment (A032) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Burlison amendment (A032) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Burlison amendment (A032) Agreed to by voice vote.
